comment:
* Policy to inject behavior into the accessibility manager.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: boolean isEnabled(boolean accessibilityEnabled)
methods.comment:
* Checks whether accessibility is enabled.
         *
         * @param accessibilityEnabled Whether the accessibility layer is enabled.
         * @return whether accessibility is enabled.

methods.name: AccessibilityEvent onAccessibilityEvent(@NonNull AccessibilityEvent event, boolean accessibilityEnabled, @EventType int relevantEventTypes)
methods.comment:
* Notifies the policy for an accessibility event.
         *
         * @param event The event.
         * @param accessibilityEnabled Whether the accessibility layer is enabled.
         * @param relevantEventTypes The events relevant events.
         * @return The event to dispatch or null.

methods.name: int getRelevantEventTypes(@EventType int relevantEventTypes)
methods.comment:
* Gets the list of relevant events.
         *
         * @param relevantEventTypes The relevant events.
         * @return The relevant events to report.

methods.name: List<AccessibilityServiceInfo> getInstalledAccessibilityServiceList(@Nullable List<AccessibilityServiceInfo> installedService)
methods.comment:
* Gets the list of installed services to report.
         *
         * @param installedService The installed services.
         * @return The services to report.

methods.name: List<AccessibilityServiceInfo> getEnabledAccessibilityServiceList(@FeedbackType int feedbackTypeFlags, @Nullable List<AccessibilityServiceInfo> enabledService)
methods.comment:
* Gets the list of enabled accessibility services.
         *
         * @param feedbackTypeFlags The feedback type to query for.
         * @param enabledService The enabled services.
         * @return The services to report.

methodNames: AccessibilityEvent onAccessibilityEvent(@NonNull AccessibilityEvent event, boolean accessibilityEnabled, @EventType int relevantEventTypes)
